Project
Table of Contents

Namespace Project.Logging.Users

Classes

UserEventType

Represents a type of user-related event to be logged.

UserLogEntry

Represents a log entry for a user-related event, containing essential user information and event details.

UserLogIndexDefinition

Defines the Elasticsearch index configuration for logging user-related events.

Interfaces

IUserLoggerService

Defines a contract for logging user-related events to an external logging system (e.g., Elasticsearch).
